metadata.title: CVE-2020-7995 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The htdocs/index.php?mainmenu=home login page in Dolibarr 10.0.6 allows anunlimited rate of failed authentication attempts.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
